    public class GroupingAtPositionActionBaseEntrance
extends GroupingAtPositionAction
    GroupingAtPositionActionBaseEntrance.java --- Grouping Action with which a executing Unit is grouping with other ones at the entrance of the base.

    • Method Detail

      • generateGroupingPosition

        protected bwapi.Position generateGroupingPosition(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Description copied from class: GroupingAtPositionAction
        Function used for generating a Position at which a Unit groups up with other Units. Is called when a new grouping Position is needed.
        Specified by:
        generateGroupingPosition in class GroupingAtPositionAction
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit that will perform the Action.
        Returns:
        a Position to which the performing Unit can move to in order to group up with other Units.

      • extractRegionsWithCenters

        private java.util.HashSet<bwta.Region> extractRegionsWithCenters(InformationStorage informationStorage)
        Function for extracting all Regions from the map that are currently holding center-Units.
        Parameters:
        informationStorage - the instance providing access to all currently relevant game information that is being shared by the different components.
        Returns:
        a HashSet of all Regions currently holding center-Units.

      • extractChokePoints

        private java.util.HashSet<bwta.Chokepoint> extractChokePoints(java.util.HashSet<bwta.Region> regions)
        Function for extracting ChokePoints from a provided HashSet of Regions. Since a Region can hold multiple ChokePoints, iterating over each one separately is necessary.
        Parameters:
        regions - the Region instances that are going to be used for accessing all ChokePoints.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all ChokePoints that are part of the provided Region HashSet.

      • extractPossibleRegionWrappers

        private java.util.List<GroupingAtPositionActionBaseEntrance.RegionWrapper> extractPossibleRegionWrappers(java.util.HashSet<bwta.Chokepoint> chokePointsAtBorders,
                                                                                                         java.util.HashSet<bwta.Region> regionsWithCenters)
        Function for extracting all possible Regions and ChokePoints in RegionWrapper instances. This function excludes Regions that contain a center-Unit, therefore only aiming at the border Regions / ChokePoints.
        Parameters:
        chokePointsAtBorders - the ChokePoints that are going to be used as reference to the Regions that are going to be checked.
        regionsWithCenters - the excluded Regions.
        Returns:
        a List of RegionWrappers that contain all possible Regions and ChokePoints which can be used for generating a grouping Position.

      • sortBasedOnDistance

        private void sortBasedOnDistance(java.util.List<GroupingAtPositionActionBaseEntrance.RegionWrapper> regionWrappers,
                                 PlayerUnit playerUnit)
        Function for sorting a List of RegionWrappers based on their ChokePoint distance towards a provided PlayerUnit.
        Parameters:
        regionWrappers - the List of RegionWrappers that is going to be sorted.
        playerUnit - the PlayerUnit which is used as reference point in the distance calculation.

      • generateGroupingPosition

        private bwapi.Position generateGroupingPosition(GroupingAtPositionActionBaseEntrance.RegionWrapper regionWrapper)
        Function for generating a Position at which Units can group up. The provided RegionWrapper instance determines all necessary information:
        • The ChokePoint determines the general location of the grouping Position
        • The Region determines the side (= Region) of the ChokePoint at which the grouping will start at
        Parameters:
        regionWrapper - the RegionWrapper that is going to be used for generating the grouping Position.
        Returns:
        a Position at the RegionWrappers ChokePoint inside the RegionWrappers referenced Region.
